title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 8000.6 - Terminal
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 8000.6 - Terminal

State Regulations
A terminal as used in sections
100-a
and
1627
of the Vehicle and Traffic Law is a highly specialized distribution facility
where long-haul intercity freight is delivered from original points of origin, or stored or distributed to final points of destination, or any combination, thereof. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 17
ยง
8000.6

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
